name: Clicker Clicker (Finbean)
description:
"Theres no way I could make a clicker game in rpg maker, right?"

-Me, 2021

a clicker game made with rpg maker mz!

In this game you click a clicker ("cursor" if you are a nerd). Every time you click the clicker, you get +4 Clicks! You can also buy buildings with Clicks to decrease the wait time for the automatic clicking machine and get other perks too!
